field.name: description_time_format

field.name: description_format
field.label: Event tooltip
field.description: Here you can customize the appearance of the event tooltip.

Here you can modify the event tooltip. The following attributes of an event are provided:
{title}, {description}, {startdate}, {starttime}, {dateseparator}, {enddate}, {endtime} {where}, {backlink}, {link}, {maplink}, {calendarname}, {calendarcolor}

field.name: textbefore
field.label: Content before calendar
field.description: This text will be displayed before the google calendar.

field.name: textafter
field.label: Content after calendar
field.description: This text will be displayed after the google calendar.

field.name: show_event_as_popup
field.label: Show Events As Popup
field.description: Shows the event details in a modal popup.

field.name: popup_width
field.label: Popu Width
field.description: If the event is shown as popup the width can be defined here.

field.name: popup_height
field.label: Popu Height
field.description: If the event is shown as popup the height can be defined here.

field.name: pageclass_sfx
field.label: Page Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css classes of the page, this allows individual page styling

field.name: theme
field.label: Theme
field.description: Define the jQuery theme (install it in the folder components/com_gcalendar/libraries/jquery/themes).

field.name: first_hour
field.label: First Hour
field.description: The first hour that will be visible in the scroll pane. Values must be from 0-23, where 0=midnight, 1=1am, etc.

field.name: min_time
field.label: Min Time
field.description: The first hour/time that will be displayed, even when the scrollbars have been scrolled all the way up. This can be a number like 5 (which means 5am), a string like '5:30' (which means 5:30am) or a string like '5:30am'.

field.name: max_time
field.label: Max Time
field.description: The last hour/time (exclusively) that will be displayed, even when the scrollbars have been scrolled all the way down. This can be a number like 22 (which means 10pm), a string like '22:30' (which means 10:30pm) or a string like '10:30pm'.

field.name: gccache

field.description: Is cacheing enabled.

field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The cache time.
